title: OpenAI launches Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite
summary: OpenAI introduces the Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite model for faster and cheaper AI content generation.
bodyHtml: The Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite model has been officially released, focusing on lightweight, fast, and affordable AI capabilities for developers worldwide.

seo.title: OpenAI launches Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite
seo.description: OpenAI introduces the Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite model for faster and cheaper AI content generation.
